Sql.CDATA: IF EXISTS ( SELECT * FROM SYS.views WHERE name = 'v_AmazonSettlementReportQuery' AND SCHEMA_ID = SCHEMA_ID('dbo') ) DROP VIEW [dbo].[v_AmazonSettlementReportQuery] GO CREATE VIEW v_AmazonSettlementReportQuery AS SELECT main.CompanyID, main.SettlementID, CAST(CAST(main.PostedDate AS DATE) AS datetime) AS PostedDate, main.OrderID, main.TransactionType, SUM(main.Amount) AS Amount, STUFF( (SELECT DISTINCT ',' + t.AmountDescription FROM LUMAmazonSettlementTransData t WHERE main.CompanyID = t.CompanyID AND main.SettlementID = t.SettlementID AND CAST(main.PostedDate AS DATE) = CAST(t.PostedDate AS DATE) AND main.OrderID = t.OrderID AND main.TransactionType = t.TransactionType FOR XML PATH ('')) , 1, 1, '') AS AmountDescriptionSummary, --STRING_AGG(main.AmountDescription, ',') AS AmountDescriptionSummaryGG, MAX(main.ErrorMessage) AS ErrorMessage FROM LUMAmazonSettlementTransData main GROUP BY main.CompanyID, main.SettlementID, CAST(main.PostedDate AS DATE), main.OrderID, main.TransactionType
